title: Are Haruki Murakami books difficult to read? - Quora

response.answer_text: Murakami isn't difficult to read! Compared to real hard hitters like James Joyce and dry, slow pieces of Gabriel Marcia Marquez, Murakami is an absolute breeze to read. However, his journalistic past makes his writing a little more on the informative side than a narrative and some readers might find that hard to follow. But then again, Murakami is not hard to read at all in my opinion.
Not at all. They have a flow that keeps you at it from the start till the end, and the suspense is amazing. My 17 year old daughter is the one who introduced me to Murakami.
